website_summaries.verdict: An absolutely stunning dollhouse that stands out from the crowd with its unique design and intricate details.
pros: High quality, durable wooden construction that lives up to the brand name
Hand-crafted with fine, ultra-realistic details inside and out
Each room features its own unique decor, adding to the overall realism
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum
Furniture, dolls, and accessories need to be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: I am 67 years old and have been putting together ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 67 years old and have been putting together Christmas toys since 1981. I bought this for my Granddaughter and it was hands down the easiest assembly I have done in all these years. Imagine the screw holes are countersunk so it goes together as fast as can be. From taking it out of the box to total assemble took 2 1/2 hours. Every part fit perfectly. Since it is Thanksgiving time I only have to wait one more month for the look on her face. I'd give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Croft

customer_reviews.title: Awesome detail and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price. Very detailed and the inside wallpaper was amazing. It went together without any issues. Had all the parts and hardware. Our grand daughter loves it. Pink of course is her favorite color. Bought a inexpensive coffee table, used a lazy susan and mounted a board on top. Glued green felt on it and that's what the doll house is setting on. Allows her to rotate it around from front to back without moving around to the other side. Looked at a lot of possible doll houses and picked this one after thinking this one would be a good one. This turned out to be the best !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy child friendly dollhouse.
customer_reviews.text: Sent in time for Christmas. Not properly packed. In fact there wasn't any packing in box between doll house box and plain brown delivery box. Outside box was held closed by one piece of tape along the top. Delivery man tipped it on its side and doll house box partially fell out. Luckily the dollhouse material and box were not damaged. This is a very solid dollhouse and heavy. After reading the reviews warning about possible splintering of some of the wood my son drilled through all the screw holes again. Only one screw hole was drilled in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: huge regret
customer_reviews.text: Although cute it is TOO heavy and rooms small and dark. AND no furniture? Too expensive to not get anything with it. Kids hardly play with. They like ones that are more open on the sides They absolutely love barbie dream house and beauty and the beast castle (my personal favorite). It’s tall and comes with furniture that’s nice. Never regretted buying.
customer_reviews.author: C-Lu

customer_reviews.title: Works with Calico Critters
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dollhouse. The instructions were very clear. It can get dark in the back, so I'm going to run twinkle lights through the windows to brighten it up. I bought it for my 6-year-old, but the 2-year-old likes it just as much! We bought Calico Critters because the furniture seemed like a higher quality than the kind made for this house.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Really lovely for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool dollhouse! It's pretty solid, except that it's pressboard/composite so there were a few little parts that got scrunched or broke during assembly. Still, it looks fantastic, and my daughter loves it. The decorative details are really nice. I love how each room is finished and ready for furniture, and the shingles are a nice touch. It's a great marriage of form and function at a decent price point; you can buy much fancier dollhouses for 3-10x the cost, but most of them need to be decorated from scratch. For an actual working, playing dollhouse out of the box, go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: twirlgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for calico critters
customer_reviews.text: Super cute inside and out! Well made all wooden .. each room is deep so you do have to reach your hand far back to reach to the back of house . Please be adviced that they accidentally marked 2 roof pieces with the same sticker. So right at the end it will look like they sent 2 of the same roof pieces , they didnt! Just labeled them the same in the instructions. 1 roof piece is slightly different. We used electric tools to put together i recommend you do the same as this house takes a few hours to assemble. Perfect for critter calicos! Does not work for Barbies
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Dean

customer_reviews.title: Nice dollhouse!
customer_reviews.text: I custom build doll houses as well as renovate pre-built ones, furnish them and donate as fundraisers to non profits. The next event is sooner than time allows and purchased this home to quick build and furnish. The quality is excellent as we come to know from Melissa and Doug product line. My less than 5 star review is only based on the instructions were not included, required me to download the pdf (happy it was available online ) and print over 20 pages to ensure the proper assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Well built, great for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 3.5 year old at Christmas... 6 months later, it's still her favorite thing in the playroom. Loves playing with coordinating doll house family along with duplo figures and many other little toy people and animals. Can definitely see this lasting for many years. Very pretty and good construction. Husband grumbled about assembly, but admitted it was easier than IKEA furniture:)
customer_reviews.author: hschlosb

customer_reviews.title: Prettier in person...
customer_reviews.text: This is really pretty when put together! It is good for a little girl. I liked the colors even better in person. I do think that it needs reinforcement on the roof somehow, maybe with glue. We have lots of little girls at our house all the time and the picture of the siding that's attached to the partial board is peeking on a corner. It would be nice if some of it was real wood. It would be sturdier. I'm a little tired of particul board.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: My son is a genius because he put it together in a couple of hours
customer_reviews.text: We love it. I bought it for my granddaughter's 3rd birthday so she would have something to play with when she visits. Eventually she will move it to her house. She is only 3 but seems to get doll house play and I love it because I miss my childhood doll house.
customer_reviews.author: Constance I. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Cool Wooden Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: Cool wooden dollhouse. Took about an hour to put together. 36-page instruction manual, I knew this before I ordered so it didn’t surprise me. Was cool to put together with the kids. Comes with plenty of screws, you should have extra. Will need a small head Phillips screwdriver. Power tools a bit too much for this project. We also used wood glue to secure it as we put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great doll house- easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in about 1.5 hours and that was a leisurely pace- following each page of the instructions. Pros: durable, cute, easy to assemble Cons: none really- a little tedious screwing all of the screws. Be sure to have some wood glue on hand for the screw covers. Overall very happy with this product.. and my kids will love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. DJ

customer_reviews.title: Child is pleased with house but thought furniture came with it
customer_reviews.text: Child is pleased with house but thought furniture came with it. Two problems, because of size one needs a dedicated spot for it where child can move around it or place it on a lazy susan so child can turn it around at will. 2nd problem, instructions are not easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: nzinga ajani

customer_reviews.title: Delightful Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dollhouse, very detailed and well made. Takes some time to put it together. Was larger than expected. Be sure to buy 1:12 furniture, which is larger than miniature dollhouses. Heavy item. Thick pressed wood. Comes with lots of screws, all the same size, but no screwdriver. Detailed instruction booklet. Takes several hours to put together. Very durable when completed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelia B

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, poor craftsmanship, and parts aren’t labeled for assembly!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheaply made doll house... if I had paid 50 bucks for it I guess I couldn’t complain, but for $120 it shouldn’t come with a cracked front door and the edges peeling up all over it. Stay away! Disappointed in mellisa and Doug for putting such a price tag on something made so cheap! Now I have to throw away 2 hours worth of work and box this up to send back for one replacement panel (the door).
customer_reviews.author: Nicklas peoples

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better from Melissa and Doug
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I expected a lot better. It wasn't like it cost a few hundred dollars, but the pre-drilled holes should at least all line up and be centered appropriately. Anyway, the cheap Chinese screws that put this dollhouse together should have been the first warning, but putting it together has been more than just a little annoying. I'm not done yet, but I am thinking of taking it apart, and buying better screws and using glue on everything and taking a couple days instead of a couple hours to put this together. Either way, it's not worth the price, unless your expectations are lower than mine.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this dollhouse as much as my six-year-old daughter. I love vintage and this is a perfect dollhouse for that. Collecting furniture for it is something we can do together so was a great purchase. It is beautiful and well constructed. It took about 2 1/2 hours to put together. That was the only drawback, but it is well worth your time. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry Lover

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but not the color shown.
customer_reviews.text: The dollhouse is well crafted and the assembly is super easy. Everything lined up nicely. However, the dollhouse I received is not even close to the color pink shown. I specifically chose this dollhouse over others because I thought it was a bright pink like the image shown online and the image on the packaging, but the one we received almost looks as if the printer was running out of ink when it printed the outside of our dollhouse. Its like a brownish peach color. It’s too close to Christmas to return so we are stuck with it. Just bummed that it’s not what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: it would be a problem because I'm not as good as they are at it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter went absolutely crazy when she got it for her birthday yesterday. She and her very handy mother and mother are going to put it together, I don't think they'll have one problem. If it was me putting it together however, it would be a problem because I'm not as good as they are at it!
customer_reviews.author: Heyjude2838

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with several broken pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it came with several broken and damaged pieces. I did not notice these until I was well into assembly on Christmas Eve night so my daughter could receive it fully assembled on Christmas morning. I had to drive on and try to make it work with the bad pieces. Very disappointing. Only giving 2 stars because I think if the pieces were all intact it would be a nice toy. It took about an hour and a half to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: ryan carney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter 2 years ago as a Christmas present. The best one available in my opinion I do loathe Barbie :( lol. My then 9 year old son was able to put it together minus part of the roof which she had him leave off. Here we are Summer 2018 and it is still sturdy and beautiful as the day she took it out the box. I will never have another daughter but maybe someday my daughter will and she will pass it down or buy her another one just like this one. Signed: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter has spent hours playing with this dollhouse ...
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter has spent hours playing with this dollhouse. We were able to put it together in about 2 1/2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My husband I just finished assembling this Christmas present for our daughter. We did a fine and careful job, but it still looks worn out. The room has tiny holes all over it, like tack holes. Some of the paper covering the walls is peeling off the edges of the board. Oh, and my favorite, was when the directions switched the pieces labeled (as in, roof piece 25 and 26 were labeled backwards, not difficult to figure out, but really?). It's for my three year old, it's a great starter dollhouse, but certainly not heirloom quality. FYI - took husband and I an hour and a half to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was much more beautiful then I could have imagined....My 11 year old daughter loved it. It was extremely easy to put together. It is all wood -- but remember it comes in boxes that need to be put together. I think it was 4 or 5 boxes..of different sizes. My daughter and I built it together....and enjoyed building it :-) She LOVES it....It is very heavy once it's built....Follow the directions carefully because once you put it together you can't go back and tighten anything. It's best if you build it and place it in one section....as it takes two people to move.
customer_reviews.author: knightreigner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy instructions, very very sturdy! My daughter loves it. We have calico critters sets in it, and they work wonderful. Very nice quality! I ran battery powered LED lights throughout the rooms so you can play in every little area no problem.
customer_reviews.author: cherrypistol8

customer_reviews.title: cute doll house
customer_reviews.text: Doll house missing pieces, don't like having the screws showing....makes it look tacky. Don't know where to write to ask for something to fill in the screws., so disappointed about that, sure takes away from the house. Also, kitchen way too small. Think manufacturer should supply something to cover all the screws. I could not put it together myself...had to get someone to put it together for me and they told me it took 2 people. Very heavy doll house. Have put it on a tv cabinet with wheels so it can be moved about for the little one to play with.
customer_reviews.author: lady from Canada

customer_reviews.title: If you have to move this thing quite often, ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have to move this thing quite often, do not plug the screw holes. I had to drill them out because the sides and parts of the roof were coming apart from moving the item.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Neices love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a large, well made doll house. 36 page instruction booklet and 91 screws to assemble but did go together easily and looks terrific. Very well made and the furniture (sold separately) is beautiful. My neices live far away so I have only seen videos of them using the doll house and eye witness reports from their mom, my sister, who chided me on the assembly. This really is an heirloom.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H. Powers

customer_reviews.title: So Adorable You Will Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. Well made and will last forever. Easy to assemble, took two of us two hours.This is a doll house to play with not put on display.Inside is finished. Only negative is the screw covers do not stay in and will have to be glued. Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Martin

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t like building.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come built and takes some time. Do yourself a favor and use Electric trip screw driver. If you don’t like building .... don’t get this. It has a bunch of pieces that could have been labeled right on the pieces so as to facilitate the process. No favors done for the buyer/builder. It’s cute but daaaaamn, it wAs a hassle to build!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana5050

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our five year old granddaughter. She loves it and has spent countless hours playing with it and the furniture her parents purchased to go with it. Would highly recommend it. It went to together quickly with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: FUN to have this little house in my big house!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a colorful and really nicely designed, meant-to-be durable dollhouse — a little pain, but a tremendous gain when it’s assembly is complete. I highly recommend this model!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful house- excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The unassembled dollhouse arrived as promised. It was well packaged, great quality, not difficult to assemble, but does take time. There was great attention to detail, and our granddaughter adores it!
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are fairly easy and straightforward
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her dollhouse. It took about 2-3 hours to assemble. The instructions are fairly easy and straightforward, I only needed a Phillips head screwdriver to put it together. Very good quality and pretty. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geemi

customer_reviews.title: Very good product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very good product at a great price. My husband and brother-in-law put this together in about an hour tonight. It's sturdy and the kids are going to love it. Heck, if they don't then I just found a new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than pleased
customer_reviews.text: Built this house for my 7 year old grand daughter last night. Took my son-in-law and I just a little over 2 hours to put together. Helped to have two sets of hands working together. Amazed at how well everything fit, including the line-up of all the pre-drilled screw holes. This gift exceeded my expectations. I will look to purchase more Melissa and Doug in the future if this house is any indication. I can barely wait to give the gift. Note: Helps to have an extra small screwdriver or bit for power drill. The screws are fairly small.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Boerman

customer_reviews.title: Big and lovely
customer_reviews.text: Big, heavy, well thought-out. No paint or wallpaper needed. Everything but the screwdriver is in the (big) box. Took less than three hours to assemble, including installing all the plugs and covers for the screw holes. Some of the screws didn't seem to grab anything but the glued-in plugs should hold them in. Our granddaughters went nuts over this house.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Triplett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and size. Seems like it will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Koehn

customer_reviews.title: I've never been disappointed by Melissa and Doug products
customer_reviews.text: I've never been disappointed by Melissa and Doug products, this is simply a beautiful and sturdy doll house. My ONLY complaint is that it's very time consuming to assemble. It's not difficult, just time-consuming. The instructions are easy to follow. I'm convinced this will last my three kids (so far) years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clarke

customer_reviews.title: pretty! comes in very heavy box
customer_reviews.text: pretty! comes in very heavy box. small phillips screwdriver not included. a little too deep for space to be 100% useful for play.
customer_reviews.author: mike b

customer_reviews.title: They like to play with their Littlest Pet Shop with it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for Christmas for my girls. They like to play with their Littlest Pet Shop with it. Easily assembled in about an hour and a half. Everything lined up perfectly. Bright colors. Looks great! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best doll house you can buy for your daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is the best doll house you can buy for your daughter. It is a bit of work to put together, but you will have an heirloom when you finish. I bought this 3 years ago and am delighted with it. Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my granddaughter, a bit to set up, but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jas Nelson

customer_reviews.title: perfect home
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this house to display small resin dolls, The house itself is very sturdy and very well made. Took my husband about 2 hours to put together. The roof is gorgeous with individual tiles. The rooms themselves arent too big, not the right size for barbies maybe like 3-4" dolls max. I love it
customer_reviews.author: ValAl

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Great price fast shipping cant wait to for daughter to open on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: It is solid and sturdy. Assembly was straightforward
customer_reviews.text: This house is so cute. It is solid and sturdy.Assembly was straightforward. Purchased for our granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: we love it. our daughters think its awesome. myself (mom), dad, and our oldest daughter have all joined in and played with our younger girls. it is fun although i didnt realize it had to be put together with soooo many screws it didnt take long and it was ready to move furniture into. it seems to be very durable and of good quality. hope this to last for many yrs.
customer_reviews.author: chaztd

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy but maybe haunted
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the gf for xmas, and she was delighted. it is very well made, although a bit of a chore to get all the pieces together. note, in case it's not clear, this house does NOT come with any of the furniture. after putting this all together, and furnishing it, my gf think its might be haunted. so we filled it with some action figures for protection and will see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: kwansolo

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed  construction
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas. Advertised as "easy to assemble with tools included". Very detailed construction and would not recommend for a novice craftsman. Allow additional time for construction.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice product and well worth the $
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. It is a nice product and well worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful and it was so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Although there were SO MUCH to put together it was well worth the money and time! I love it and my daughter loves it! Will forever order the big toys from Melissa and Doug! They are study, well made and worth it! Loved this. Any time.e you want to make a large purchase for your child, this company is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Shops

customer_reviews.title: It's a great doll house and accommodates a lot of furniture i ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great doll house and accommodates a lot of furniture i had as a child. The only issue was that it came with some defects-pieces that were missing or done inside out! Fortunately my son is a professional builder and remastered them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prana gal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll house
customer_reviews.text: A well received very special Christmas present for our grandchildren. It was easy to assemble in a time frame which didn't loose the attention of the children. Our grand-daughter thought her Mommy would love to live in a house like this! The house is so much better than those showy plastic super-modern "dream homes". This house will become a family heirloom!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great dollhouse especially for the price! We've had ours for almost a year and it's holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: melissa & doug dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations.It is solid wood. My 5yr old grand daughter hasn't stopped playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to build, took me about 2.5 hours from start to finish. Quality materials and looks cute as a button when done!
customer_reviews.author: sforbes

customer_reviews.title: Another quality product from M&D
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Quality. It looks so beautiful and there were so many details that makes this doll house very pretty. It does take few hours to assemble but instructions were easy to follow. Couldn't be much happier. My daughter loved it as her birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sab

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not a problem
customer_reviews.text: A very well designed Doll house. The kit is heavy because the materials are of good quality. The holes for the screws all lined up, so assembly went well. My 6-year old was pleased to help me put it together. All surfaces have durable finishes, and so we won't have to paint or "wall-paper" like in my older girl's dollhouse. I expect this present will last long into her adulthood.
customer_reviews.author: T. Zellers

customer_reviews.title: simple, beuatiful, and awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase ever. It was super easy to assemble and the kids loved doing it. It was quick easy and beautiful all in one. It is an awesome purchase and well worth the investment. Thanks again Amazon for making Christmas a blessed day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Idea is nice, but quality is not
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice house, but assembly has to be done very gently as screws will quickly splinter the wood. Also we received one wrong roof part in the box and now can't assemble the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: JenB

customer_reviews.title: What a  great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product A solidly built, beautifully detailed, easy to put together doll house. Directions were a breeze. Sort the pieces first and number them before you start. Be sure to use proper size screw drivers and line up all holes. Wood did not split; construction is solid. We had one damaged piece, called customer service on a Mon. and the new piece was here by Thurs. The company couldn't have bee nicer to deal with. We think this doll house will be passed down from our 2 1/2/ year old grand-daughter to future generations.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Weinblatt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: House is cute but the furniture breaks very easy. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Russell

customer_reviews.title: hard to play for 2 kids...impossible for 3
customer_reviews.text: rooms are not very practical to furnish big opening on one side but very small on the other side make it hard too play with 2 kids
customer_reviews.author: PymS.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instruction are very well written. Product is excellently put together. Should last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Elpidio B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful doll house but is a bit dificult to find ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful doll house but is a bit dificult to find furniture and dolls adecuate to the size. My 3 year old grandaughter doesn't mind about it and just plays very well with some dolls we found.
customer_reviews.author: Gimena

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the most difficult to put together but still a pain if that makes any sense.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful dollhouse.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dollhpusr for my daughter's birthday. I haven't given it to her yet but in have built it and I must say that it is fantastic. The detail is wonderful and they truly made sure ever piece lined up perfectly. It was also much easier to put together then expected as long as you sort the pieces and label them first. It also is slightly bigger than expected. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: lemarph81

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Too Cute! The details/edges are a little off and item is priced per quality, if you want something more perfect I would suggest either building your own or finding/paying more for something per quality.
customer_reviews.author: Raines Fam.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, your kid will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to the very last detail, worth every last dime. I bought this for my 10 year old. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer from Corpus Christi

customer_reviews.title: Heard no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Well, the little one's happy with it, and I've since heard no complaints so I'm guessing it's just fine. Got this for my little cousin and haven't heard from her since...well..happy customer ha.
customer_reviews.author: 0n-3

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dolls house
customer_reviews.text: This is a really lovely dolls house. It did take a few hours to put together but it was pretty simple to do with just a screwdriver. The detail is very nice, different wall coverings and floors in all the rooms. It's big and weighs a lot though, and my husband has to carry it if it needs moving! My son loves it, he can't quite believe it's his dolls house, he says it's beautiful. We have some of the Melissa and Doug room sets in it and they are very nice too. I would highly recommend this dolls house for anyone, it really is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: You will need wood glue
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the house. There was some fit issues with the front panel but otherwise went together smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Gislason

customer_reviews.title: really a cut doll house. My granddaughter loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: really a cut doll house. My granddaughter loves it. Went together easier than I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Carlock

customer_reviews.title: Not much for quality
customer_reviews.text: The door to the front of the house arrived broken from being compressed in the box, small defect, scratches and bubbles in the flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best INVENTION EVER~
customer_reviews.text: Altho we got it for my daughter, even myself am in love with this doll house. Great size and height for a child and so many things she can pretend to be doing that its a great way to entertain kids in a healthy way :D
customer_reviews.author: DaNika-Rae Smalley

customer_reviews.title: made well fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: granddaughter loved it then moved on to Barbie but it was well made and she loved it till her taste changed
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautful dollhouse and was a Christmas gift. Our daughter has really enjoyed everything about this house. My husband set aside one morning to assemble the house. Which took about 3 to 4 hours. Unlike other wooden dollhouses we looked at, this one was painted, had wallpapper and hardwood floors. Once again Melissa & Doug has made another great product.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This toy was absolutely fantastic...santa dropped it off for our 2 1/2 year old daughter and she loves it....my sister-in-law suggested we get calico critters furniture and accessories at this stage bc the actual furniture that goes with the house is more fragile! FYI
customer_reviews.author: Julie McCue

customer_reviews.title: sat all night building and missing a part.. ...
customer_reviews.text: sat all night building and missing a part... Now my only option is to send the whole product back???
customer_reviews.author: Mishelle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get all the pieces.
customer_reviews.text: There was no bottom floor. It was very hard to get Melissa and Doug to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Camellia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: This dollhouse is very sturdy and looks great once put together. I would say the only downfall to construction of the dollhouse is none of the panels are labeled (even though the written instructions letter the panels)so you have to find the correct panel by looking at the pictures. None are exactly the same, but it obviously took longer to put together because of this. The kitchen and bathroom are a little small for furniture. My daughter absolutely loved it. It is so big. She will get years of playing with this dollhouse.
customer_reviews.author: H. Snapp

customer_reviews.title: Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dollhouse for my 6 year old daughter. It is made of all wood or processed wood product. It is very sturdy and the furniture you can buy for it is great. All the doors and drawers open on the dressers and cabinets. It reminds me of something we used to play with when I was a kid. I believe it will withstand a lot of playtime. One word of warning, it does come with 90 screws and took some time to put together, but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cah9e

customer_reviews.title: GREAT dollhouse for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 yr old daughter loves this!! It's a perfect size, and absolutely adorable! There are quite a few pieces to put together - but it's not hard, just a little time consuming. Would definetly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: HCole

customer_reviews.title: Melissa and Doug Victorian Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: Good quality overall. It was easy to assemble. Very heavy once it's all put together. The wood framing around the front door was cracked, but I glued it and it looked fine. My 7 year old daughter was ecstatic with it. Very pleased with my purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: eshadey

customer_reviews.title: Verypretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful doll house... That my four year old loves. We found a table at goodwill, because this has a large footprint. I'd recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ATLKrissy

customer_reviews.title: Keepsake dollhouse that is usable too!
customer_reviews.text: This dollhouse is all they said it would be. Solid, well constructed, and beautiful but usable and kid-friendly. My children have loved it and this is a collection I will save forever. I had wanted a long-term wooden doll house option but didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars--this more than fits the bill! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: mcnorman10

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice detailed! Had some problems with small scratched surfaces and one floor was broken. But happy after all!
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Villalon

customer_reviews.title: melissa and doug classic heirloom victorian doll house
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this doll house, my three years old daughter love it and she play with it all the times. Well made, absolutely adorable! Another Great Buy, Thak you! Phuong
customer_reviews.author: phuong

customer_reviews.title: Great solid toy!
customer_reviews.text: The house is great, very solid. But not easy to put together. We had to drill several holes that were not put in. Overall it took about 1 hour to put together with a small hand power drill which seemed to be the key
customer_reviews.author: Kiya1234

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This dollhouse took us a couple hours to put together but so worth it. Gorgeous, sturdy, and lots of fun for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: Dollhouse came as described - was fairly easy to assemble - daughter was very happy. Much cheaper and easier than some of those kits. Allowed daughter to play with house the same day she received.
customer_reviews.author: Krissiekins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cant wait to see her face on christmas day as this will be presented as the completely furnished dollhouse!
customer_reviews.author: Norka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful dollhouse we have left it in the livingroom well after Christmas because it's so pretty sitting there. There isn't a child that comes in that doesn't run over to it immediately. It comes needing assembly but the directions are clear and it took me about an hour with no problems. We haven't had it for very long so I can't say how many years it will last but it feels very sturdy and durable. I love to play with this as much as the kids do! I got it for my five-year-old but younger kids seem to like it a lot and also my 8-year-old and her friends play with it.
customer_reviews.author: CaraMia

customer_reviews.title: strong,easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: best dad ever after this was given to my daughter
customer_reviews.author: harvest13

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too many pieces to assemble, but my niece loves it so you get 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Almost all of the pieces had some sort of damage. Some pieces had a brown sticky film on them. Some of the edges were peeling. The trim around 3 windows were broken off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For My 3 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: This doll house is great quality, very sturdy and heavy. My kids LOVE it and have been playing with it non-stop!
customer_reviews.author: Strong5

customer_reviews.title: Faux indeed
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty and quaint but for the cost the rooms are soooo tiny and dark and it's hard for my girl to get her tiny hands in and play with ease. cant even get all of the kitchen pieces in at the same time. Should have heeded the other reviewers warnings. Looks nice and my daughter was so excited to get it but I think it was sort of anticlimactic for her! 3 stars are for the outward appearance.
customer_reviews.author: butterflybee

customer_reviews.title: A dream and a legacy
customer_reviews.text: Liked the idea of how the rooms are. The furniture fits perfectly. A legacy for my grandchildren for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: maureen m seftchick

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Victorian Dollhouse
product_meta.description:
This classic dollhouse features Victorian styling and a pretty pink coat of paint. Hardware and clear instructions are included to assist with assembling the sturdy wooden pieces, which connect with a single type of screw. (No sorting!) After the easy assembly, this elegant home is tough enough to stand up to daily imaginative play. Decorated inside and out, it's packed with exquisite details to hold the attention of the older child or collector: The romantic exterior includes intricately patterned friezes and gables, illustrated brackets and latticework; interior details include unique wall coverings in every room, exquisite turned balusters, and beautifully "finished" floors. Use the available furniture sets to outfit the six rooms and move right in with our Victorian Dollhouse Family, or play with any 1:12 scale dolls (about 5 in. tall) and furniture. However your family chooses to play with it, this elegant home is sure to be cherished for many years to come! Pediatricians recommend toys that inspire hands-on imaginative thinking. This toy makes a great gift for 6-year-olds, 7-year-olds, 8-year-olds, and up. It's a perfect gift for birthdays and special occasions. Add a Melissa & Doug Victorian Doll Family to round out the play experience and give kids another engaging option for screen-free fun. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully-designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest-quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: Intricate, realistic Victorian detailing: hand-painted shingles, scroll-cut accents, ornate window frames, elegant staircases
Full-color interior graphics unique to every room
Makes a great gift for ages 6 and up, for hands-on, screen-free play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars284 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
